# Introduction

Eventually, this page will provie more background on high power rocketry.

These pages outline the basics of High Power Rocketry as defined in [NFPA 1127](https://www.nfpa.org/codes-and-standards/1/nfpa-1/2/nfpa-1127) and by \[TRA\](<https://www.tripoli.org/>) and \[NAR\](<https://www.nar.org/>).

The [Certification](/intro/cert.qmd) process is explainied on the linked page.
